import React, { useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import './App.css' import humidity from './humidity.png' import pressure from './resilient.png' import high from './high-temperature.png' import low from './low-temperature.png' import wind from './wind.png' const key="a74e21e2e11290ddc996d96f101cb1c8"; const App = () => { const [city,setCity]=useState(''); const [data,setData]=useState(); const fetchData=async()=>{ try{ const response=await axios.get(`https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=${city}&appid=${key}`); setData(response.data); console.log(response.data); } catch(err){ alert('please enter city name correctly'); } } return (

weather

setCity(e.target.value)} placeholder='enter the city name' />
{data && (

{data.name},{data.sys.country}

{Math.round(data.main.temp- 273.15)} °C
{data.weather[0].description}
Lat - {data.coord.lat}
Lon - {data.coord.lon}
)}
{/*
Pressure
{data.main.pressure} mb
Humidity
{data.main.humidity} %
High
{Math.round(data.main.temp_max-273.15)} °C
Low
{Math.round(data.main.temp_min-273.15)} °C
Wind
{data.wind.speed} m/s
*/}
) } export default App
